evidence.claim: Red Arrow Labs utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The company implements HIPAA compliance in its health technology solutions.
Integration with HL7 standards is part of their health tech offerings.
Red Arrow Labs uses AWS S3 for data storage solutions.
They have a FHIR API for health data interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transaction capabilities or specific use cases related to healthcare data exchange.
